title: Support Tickets
body: How long does it take to have your support ticket responded to? Mine was submitted 2 days ago and I haven't gotten a single response. Something like this happened before to me as well... I made a discussion similar to this one and they said that my ticket was accidentally put into the wrong category or something? That might not be the case this time, but I'm just curious as to how long this takes. Thanks!

replies.body:
It really depends on the type of ticket, but response times are a bit longer than normal right now due to a large number of tickets submitted recently. If you sit tight, we'll have a specialist get back to you as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have any questions.

If I had typos in my ticket subject, is it better to leave it as is (it's been open for a week already) or to resubmit it with proper subject spelling? I accidentally wrote "accounted" instead of "account". I really don't want to move to the back of the queue after a week though, as a week already seems like a ludicrous amount of time to wait. {{item:3070}}
No need to edit your title or ticket, as I'm confident our specialists will understand what you mean.
I'm currently sitting on six days.
